questions.question: In the property req4_req5_gnt4_d3_gnt5_C, how many cycles must pass in between a until a request is granted?
What is the name of the property that makes sure there cannot be 32 !grant[4]'s?
What is the name of the cover property which allows the following case: request[4] && !grant[4] ##1 !grant[4] ##1 grant[4]?
What is the name of the coverage bin hit if grant[4] is 1 within 32 cycles?
